name: Baked Maple and Chipotle Wings
author: Chef V
summary: Sweet with heat! YUM! The smoky heat of the chipotle powder mixed with the sweetness of the maple syrup makes you keep coming back for more! Makes a great appetizer at your next Grey Cup party.
ingredients: 1 ½ tablespoons ground dried chipotle pepper
directions: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Whisk cornstarch, chipotle pepper, and salt together in a large bowl
Place chicken wings into the chili mixture; stir  until wings are evenly coated
Arrange wings about an inch apart on the prepared baking sheet
Bake in the preheated oven until golden on top, about 30 minutes; turn wings over and bake an additional 20 minutes
Remove wings from oven; drizzle with maple syrup
Return wings to the oven and bake until deeply golden, about 10 minutes more
